name: sloth.css
description: A drop-in utility component CSS library for lazy mammals like me.

scripts.build:default: npx postcss src/sloth.css -u postcss-import -u cssnano -o dist/sloth.min.css --no-map
scripts.build:core: npx postcss src/sloth.core.css -u postcss-import -u cssnano -o dist/sloth.core.min.css --no-map
scripts.build:util: npx postcss src/sloth.util.css -u postcss-import -u cssnano -o dist/sloth.util.min.css --no-map
scripts.build: npm run build:default && npm run build:core && npm run build:util
